DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy of catheter ablation and rate control in heart failure patients with atrial fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Catheter Ablation and Rate Control of Atrial Fibrillation in Patients With Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: All patients received either catheter ablation for rhythm control or rate control before enrollment, and the investigators do not assign specific interventions to the subjects during the study. So this study might be considered to be observational.
DOC.criteria: age>18 years documented atrial fibrillation New York Heart Association ⅡⅣ or left ventricular ejection fraction <50% heart failure that had a suspected reversible cause previous ablation any contraindication to catheter ablation
